paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-4-iii
paragraph.content: A statement that the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (c)(4)(ii) of this section can increase over time;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-4-iv
paragraph.content: A statement of whether the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (c)(4)(ii) of this section includes payments for property taxes, amounts identified in § 1026.4(b)(8), and other amounts described in paragraph (c)(4)(ii) of this section, along with a description of any such other amounts, and an indication of whether such amounts will be paid by the creditor using escrow account funds;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-4-v
paragraph.content: A statement that the consumer must pay separately any amounts described in paragraph (c)(4)(ii) of this section that are not paid by the creditor using escrow account funds; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-4-vi
paragraph.content: A reference to the information disclosed pursuant to paragraph (g)(3) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-5
paragraph.title: Calculation of taxes and insurance.
paragraph.content: For purposes of paragraphs (c)(2)(iii) and (c)(4)(ii) of this section, estimated property taxes and homeowner’s insurance shall reflect:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-5-i
paragraph.content: The taxable assessed value of the real property securing the transaction after consummation, including the value of any improvements on the property or to be constructed on the property, if known, whether or not such construction will be financed from the proceeds of the transaction, for property taxes; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-c-5-ii
paragraph.content: The replacement costs of the property during the initial year after the transaction, for amounts identified in § 1026.4(b)(8).

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1
paragraph.title: Costs at closing table.
paragraph.content: In a separate table, under the heading “Costs at Closing”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-i
paragraph.content: Labeled “Closing Costs,” the dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (g)(6) of this section, together with:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-i-A
paragraph.content: A statement that the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (d)(1)(i) of this section includes the amounts disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f)(4), (g)(5), and (g)(6)(ii);

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-i-B
paragraph.content: The dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (f)(4) of this section, labeled “Loan Costs”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-i-C
paragraph.content: The dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (g)(5) of this section, labeled “Other Costs”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-i-D
paragraph.content: The dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (g)(6)(ii) of this section, labeled “Lender Credits”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-i-E
paragraph.content: A statement referring the consumer to the tables disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f) and (g) of this section for details.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-ii
paragraph.content: Labeled “Cash to Close,” the dollar amount calculated in accordance with paragraph (h)(1)(viii) of this section, together with:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-ii-A
paragraph.content: A statement that the amount includes the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (d)(1)(i) of this section, and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-1-ii-B
paragraph.content: A statement referring the consumer to the location of the table required pursuant to paragraph (h) of this section for details.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-2
paragraph.title: Optional alternative table for transactions without a seller.
paragraph.content: For transactions that do not involve a seller, instead of the amount and statements described in paragraph (d)(1)(ii) of this section, the creditor may alternatively disclose, using the label “Cash to Close”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-2-i
paragraph.content: The amount calculated in accordance with (h)(2)(iv) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-2-ii
paragraph.content: A statement of whether the disclosed estimated amount is due from or to the consumer; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-d-2-iii
paragraph.content: A statement referring the consumer to the alternative table disclosed pursuant to paragraph (h)(2) of this section for details.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-e
paragraph.title: Web site reference.
paragraph.content: A statement that the consumer may obtain general information and tools at the Web site of the Bureau, and the link or uniform resource locator address to the Web site: www.consumerfinance.gov/mortgage-estimate.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f
paragraph.title: Closing cost details; loan costs.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading “Closing Cost Details,” in a table under the heading “Loan Costs,” all loan costs associated with the transaction. The table shall contain the items and amounts listed under four subheadings, described in paragraphs (f)(1) through (4) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-1
paragraph.title: Origination charges.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Origination Charges,” an itemization of each amount, and a subtotal of all such amounts, that the consumer will pay to each creditor and loan originator for originating and extending the credit.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-1-i
paragraph.content: The points paid to the creditor to reduce the interest rate shall be itemized separately, as both a percentage of the amount of credit extended and a dollar amount, and using the label “__% of Loan Amount (Points).” If points to reduce the interest rate are not paid, the disclosure required by this paragraph (f)(1)(i) must be blank.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-1-ii
paragraph.content: The number of items disclosed under this paragraph (f)(1), including the points disclosed under paragraph (f)(1)(i) of this section, shall not exceed 13.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-2
paragraph.title: Services you cannot shop for.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Services You Cannot Shop For,” an itemization of each amount, and a subtotal of all such amounts, the consumer will pay for settlement services for which the consumer cannot shop in accordance with § 1026.19(e)(1)(vi)(A) and that are provided by personpersons other than the creditor or mortgage broker.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-2-i
paragraph.content: For any item that is a component of title insurance or is for conducting the closing, the introductory description “Title —” shall appear at the beginning of the label for that item.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-2-ii
paragraph.content: The number of items disclosed under this paragraph (f)(2) shall not exceed 13.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-3
paragraph.title: Services you can shop for.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Services You Can Shop For,” an itemization of each amount and a subtotal of all such amounts the consumer will pay for settlement services for which the consumer can shop in accordance with §1026.19(e)(1)(vi)(A) and that are provided by persons other than the creditor or mortgage broker.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-3-i
paragraph.content: For any item that is a component of title insurance or is for conducting the closing, the introductory description “Title —” shall appear at the beginning of the label for that item.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-3-ii
paragraph.content: The number of items disclosed under this paragraph (f)(3) shall not exceed 14.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-4
paragraph.title: Total loan costs.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Total Loan Costs,” the sum of the subtotals disclosed under paragraphs (f)(1) through (3) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-5
paragraph.title: Item descriptions and ordering.
paragraph.content: The items listed as loan costs pursuant to this paragraph (f) shall be labeled using terminology that describes each item, subject to the requirements of paragraphs (f)(1)(i), (f)(2)(i), and (f)(3)(i) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-5-i
paragraph.content: The item prescribed in paragraph (f)(1)(i) of this section for points shall be the first item listed in the disclosure pursuant to paragraph (f)(1) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-5-ii
paragraph.content: All other items must be listed in alphabetical order by their labels under the applicable subheading.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-6-i
paragraph.content: An addendum to a form of disclosures prescribed by this section may not be used for items described in paragraph (f)(1) or (2) of this section. If the creditor is not able to itemize every service and every corresponding charge required to be disclosed in the number of lines provided by paragraph (f)(1)(ii) or (f)(2)(ii) of this section, the remaining charges shall be disclosed as an aggregate amount in the last line permitted under paragraph (f)(1)(ii) or (f)(2)(ii), as applicable, labeled “Additional Charges.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-6-ii
paragraph.content: An addendum to a form of disclosures prescribed by this section may be used for items described in paragraph (f)(3) of this section. If the creditor is not able to itemize all of the charges required to be disclosed in the number of lines provided by paragraph (f)(3)(ii), the remaining charges shall be disclosed as follows:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-6-i-A
paragraph.content: Label the last line permitted under paragraph (f)(3)(ii) with an appropriate reference to an addendum and list the remaining items on the addendum in accordance with the requirements in paragraphs (f)(3) and (5) of this section; or

paragraph.label: 1026-37-f-6-i-B
paragraph.content: Disclose the remaining charges as an aggregate amount in the last line permitted under paragraph (f)(3)(ii), labeled “Additional Charges.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g
paragraph.title: Closing cost details; other costs.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading “Closing Cost Details,” in a table under the heading “Other Costs,” all costs associated with the transaction that are in addition to the costs disclosed under paragraph (f) of this section. The table shall contain the items and amounts listed under six subheadings, described in paragraphs (g)(1) through (6) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-1
paragraph.title: Taxes and other government fees.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Taxes and Other Government Fees,” the amounts to be paid to State and local governments for taxes and other government fees, and the subtotal of all such amounts, as follows:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-1-i
paragraph.content: On the first line, the sum of all recording fees and other government fees and taxes, except for transfer taxes paid by the consumer and disclosed pursuant to paragraph (g)(1)(ii) of this section, labeled “Recording Fees and Other Taxes.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-1-ii
paragraph.content: On the second line, the sum of all transfer taxes paid by the consumer, labeled “Transfer Taxes.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-1-iii
paragraph.content: If an amount required to be disclosed by this paragraph (g)(1) is not charged to the consumer, the amount disclosed on the applicable line required by this paragraph (g)(1) must be blank.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2
paragraph.title: Prepaids.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Prepaids,” an itemization of the amounts to be paid by the consumer in advance of the first scheduled payment, and the subtotal of all such amounts, as follows:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2-i
paragraph.content: On the first line, the number of months for which homeowner’s insurance premiums are to be paid by the consumer at consummation and the total dollar amount to be paid by the consumer at consummation for such premiums, labeled “Homeowner’s Insurance Premium ( __ months).”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2-ii
paragraph.content: On the second line, the number of months for which mortgage insurance premiums are to be paid by the consumer at consummation and the total dollar amount to be paid by the consumer at consummation for such premiums, labeled “Mortgage Insurance Premium ( __ months).”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2-iii
paragraph.content: On the third line, the amount of prepaid interest to be paid per day, the number of days for which prepaid interest will be collected, the interest rate, and the total dollar amount to be paid by the consumer at consummation for such interest, labeled “Prepaid Interest ( ___ per day for __ days @__ %).”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2-iv
paragraph.content: On the fourth line, the number of months for which property taxes are to be paid by the consumer at consummation and the total dollar amount to be paid by the consumer at consummation for such taxes, labeled “Property Taxes ( __ months).”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2-v
paragraph.content: If an amount is not charged to the consumer for any item for which this paragraph (g)(2) prescribes a label, each of the amounts required to be disclosed on that line must be blank.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-2-vi
paragraph.content: A maximum of three additional items may be disclosed under this paragraph (g)(2), and each additional item must be identified and include the applicable time period covered by the amount to be paid by the consumer at consummation and the total amount to be paid.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-3
paragraph.title: Initial escrow payment at closing.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Initial Escrow Payment at Closing,” an itemization of the amounts that the consumer will be expected to place into a reserve or escrow account at consummation to be applied to recurring periodic charges, and the subtotal of all such amounts, as follows:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-3-i
paragraph.content: On the first line, the amount escrowed per month, the number of months covered by an escrowed amount collected at consummation, and the total amount to be paid into the escrow account by the consumer at consummation for homeowner’s insurance premiums, labeled “Homeowner’s Insurance __ per month for __ mo.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-3-ii
paragraph.content: On the second line, the amount escrowed per month, the number of months covered by an escrowed amount collected at consummation, and the total amount to be paid into the escrow account by the consumer at consummation for mortgage insurance premiums, labeled “Mortgage Insurance __ per month for __ mo.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-3-iii
paragraph.content: On the third line, the amount escrowed per month, the number of months covered by an escrowed amount collected at consummation, and the total amount to be paid into the escrow account by the consumer at consummation for property taxes, labeled “Property Taxes __ per month for __ mo.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-3-iv
paragraph.content: If an amount is not charged to the consumer for any item for which this paragraph (g)(3) prescribes a label, each of the amounts required to be disclosed on that line must be blank.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-3-v
paragraph.content: A maximum of five items may be disclosed pursuant to this paragraph (g)(3) in addition to the items described in paragraph (g)(3)(i) through (iii) of this section, and each such additional item must be identified with a descriptive label and include the applicable amount per month, the number of months collected at consummation, and the total amount to be paid.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-4
paragraph.title: Other.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Other,” an itemization of any other amounts in connection with the transaction that the consumer is likely to pay or has contracted with a person other than the creditor or loan originator to pay at closing and of which the creditor is aware at the time of issuing the Loan Estimate, a descriptive label of each such amount, and the subtotal of all such amounts.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-4-i
paragraph.content: For any item that is a component of title insurance, the introductory description “Title —” shall appear at the beginning of the label for that item.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-4-ii
paragraph.content: The parenthetical description “(optional)” shall appear at the end of the label for items disclosing any premiums paid for separate insurance, warranty, guarantee, or event-coverage products.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-4-iii
paragraph.content: The number of items disclosed under this paragraph (g)(4) shall not exceed five.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-5
paragraph.title: Total other costs.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Total Other Costs,” the sum of the subtotals disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (g)(1) through (4) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-6
paragraph.title: Total closing costs.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Total Closing Costs,” the component amounts and their sum, as follows:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-6-i
paragraph.content: The sum of the amounts disclosed as loan costs and other costs under paragraphs (f)(4) and (g)(5) of this section, labeled “D + I”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-6-ii
paragraph.content: The amount of any lender credits, disclosed as a negative number with the label “Lender Credits” provided that, if no such amount is disclosed, the amount must be blank.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-7
paragraph.title: Item descriptions and ordering.
paragraph.content: The items listed as other costs pursuant to this paragraph (g) shall be labeled using terminology that describes each item.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-7-i
paragraph.content: The items prescribed in paragraphs (g)(1)(i) and (ii), (g)(2)(i) through (iv), and (g)(3)(i) through (iii) of this section must be listed in the order prescribed as the initial items under the applicable subheading, with any additional items to follow.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-7-ii
paragraph.content: All additional items must be listed in alphabetical order under the applicable subheading.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-g-8
paragraph.title: Use of addenda.
paragraph.content: An addendum to a form of disclosures prescribed by this section may not be used for items required to be disclosed by this paragraph (g). If the creditor is not able to itemize all of the charges described in this paragraph (g) in the number of lines provided by paragraphs (g)(2)(vi), (3)(v), or (4)(iii) of this section, the remaining charges shall be disclosed as an aggregate amount in the last line permitted under paragraphs (g)(2)(vi), (g)(3)(v), or (g)(4)(iii), as applicable, using the label “Additional Charges.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1
paragraph.title: For all transactions.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading “Closing Cost Details,” under the heading “Calculating Cash to Close,” the total amount of cash or other funds that must be provided by the consumer at consummation, with an itemization of that amount into the following component amounts:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-i
paragraph.title: Total closing costs.
paragraph.content: The amount disclosed under paragraph (g)(6) of this section, disclosed as a positive number, labeled “Total Closing Costs”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-ii
paragraph.title: Closing costs to be financed.
paragraph.content: The amount of any closing costs to be paid out of loan proceeds, disclosed as a negative number, labeled “Closing Costs Financed (Paid from your Loan Amount)”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-iii
paragraph.title: Downpayment and other funds from borrower.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Down Payment/Funds from Borrower”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-iii-A
paragraph.content: In a purchase transaction as defined in paragraph (a)(9)(i) of this section, the amount of the difference between the purchase price of the property and the principal amount of the loan, disclosed as a positive number; or

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-iii-B
paragraph.content: In all transactions other than purchase transactions as defined in paragraph (a)(9)(i) of this section, the estimated funds from the consumer as determined in accordance with paragraph (h)(1)(v) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-iv-A
paragraph.content: In a purchase transaction as defined in paragraph (a)(9)(i) of this section, the amount that is paid to the seller or held in trust or escrow by an attorney or other party under the terms of the agreement for the sale of the property, disclosed as a negative number, labeled “Deposit”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-iv-B
paragraph.content: In all transactions other than purchase transactions as defined in paragraph (a)(9)(i) of this section, the amount of $0, labeled “Deposit”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-v
paragraph.title: Funds for borrower.
paragraph.content: The amount of funds for the consumer, labeled “Funds for Borrower.” The amount of funds from the consumer disclosed under paragraph (h)(1)(iii)(B) of this section, and of funds for the consumer disclosed under this paragraph (h)(1)(v) of this section, are determined by subtracting the principal amount of the credit extended (excluding any amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (h)(1)(ii) of this section) from the total amount of all existing debt being satisfied in the transaction (except to the extent the satisfaction of such existing debt is disclosed under paragraph (g) of this section);

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-v-A
paragraph.content: If the calculation under this paragraph (h)(1)(v) yields an amount that is a positive number, such amount is disclosed under paragraph (h)(1)(iii)(B) of this section, and $0 is disclosed under this paragraph (h)(1)(v);

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-v-B
paragraph.content: If the calculation under this paragraph (h)(1)(v) yields an amount that is a negative number, such amount is disclosed under this paragraph (h)(1)(v) as a negative number, and $0 is disclosed under paragraph (h)(1)(iii)(B) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-v-C
paragraph.content: If the calculation under this paragraph (h)(1)(v) of this section yields $0, then $0 is disclosed under paragraphs (h)(1)(iii)(B) and paragraph (h)(1)(v) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-vi
paragraph.title: Seller credits.
paragraph.content: The total amount that the seller will pay for total loan costs as determined by paragraph (f)(4) of this section and total other costs as determined by paragraph (g)(5) of this section, to the extent known, disclosed as a negative number, labeled “Seller Credits”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-vii
paragraph.title: Adjustments and other credits.
paragraph.content: The amount of all loan costs determined pursuant to paragraph (f) and other costs determined pursuant to paragraph (g) that are paid by persons other than the loan originator, creditor, consumer, or seller, together with any other amounts that are required to be paid by the consumer at closing pursuant to a purchase and sale contract, disclosed as a negative number, labeled “Adjustments and Other Credits”; and (viii) Estimated Cash to Close. The sum of the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (h)(1)(i) through (vii) of this section labeled “Cash to Close.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-1-viii
paragraph.title: Estimated Cash to Close.
paragraph.content: The sum of the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (h)(1)(i) through (vii) of this section labeled “Cash to Close.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-2
paragraph.title: Optional alternative calculating cash to close table for transactions without a seller.
paragraph.content: For transactions that do not involve a seller, instead of the table described in paragraph (h)(1) above, the creditor may alternatively provide, in a separate table, under the master heading “Closing Cost Details,” under the heading “Calculating Cash to Close,” the total amount of cash or other funds that must be provided by the consumer at consummation with an itemization of that amount into the following component amounts:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-2-i
paragraph.title: Loan amount.
paragraph.content: The amount disclosed under paragraph (b)(1) of this section, labeled “Loan Amount”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-2-ii
paragraph.title: Total closing costs.
paragraph.content: The amount disclosed under paragraph (g)(6) of this section, disclosed as a negative number, labeled “Total Closing Costs”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-2-iii
paragraph.title: Payoffs and payments.
paragraph.content: The total amount of payoffs and payments to be made to third parties not otherwise disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f) and (g) of this section, disclosed as a negative number, labeled “Total Payoffs and Payments”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-2-iv
paragraph.title: Cash to or from consumer.
paragraph.content: The amount of cash or other funds due from or to the consumer and a statement of whether the disclosed estimated amount is due from or to the consumer, calculated by the sum of the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (h)(2)(i) through (iii) of this section, labeled “Cash to Close”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-h-2-v
paragraph.title: Closing costs financed.
paragraph.content: The sum of the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (h)(2)(i) and (iii) of this section, but only to the extent that the sum is greater than zero and less than or equal to the sum disclosed under paragraph (g)(6) of this section, labeled “Closing Costs Financed (Paid from your Loan Amount).”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i
paragraph.title: Adjustable payment table.
paragraph.content: If the periodic principal and interest payment may change after consummation but not based on an adjustment to the interest rate, or if the transaction is a seasonal payment product as described in paragraph (a)(10)(ii)(E) of this section, a separate table under the master heading “Closing Cost Details” required by paragraph (f) of this section and under the heading “Adjustable Payment (AP) Table” that contains the following information and satisfies the following requirements:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-1
paragraph.title: Interest only payments.
paragraph.content: Whether the transaction is an interest only product pursuant to paragraph (a)(10)(ii)(B) of this section as an affirmative or negative answer to the question “Interest Only Payments?” and, if an affirmative answer is disclosed, the period during which interest only periodic payments are scheduled.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-2
paragraph.title: Optional payments.
paragraph.content: Whether the terms of the legal obligation expressly provide that the consumer may elect to pay a specified periodic principal and interest payment in an amount other than the scheduled amount of the payment, as an affirmative or negative answer to the question “Optional Payments?” and, if an affirmative answer is disclosed, the period during which the consumer may elect to make such payments.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-3
paragraph.title: Step payments.
paragraph.content: Whether the transaction is a step payment product pursuant to paragraph (a)(10)(ii)(C) of this section as an affirmative or negative answer to the question “Step Payments?” and, if an affirmative answer is disclosed, the period during which the regular periodic payments are scheduled to increase.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-4
paragraph.title: Seasonal payments.
paragraph.content: Whether the transaction is a seasonal payment product pursuant to paragraph (a)(10)(ii)(E) of this section as an affirmative or negative answer to the question “Seasonal Payments?” and, if an affirmative answer is disclosed, the period during which periodic payments are not scheduled.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-5
paragraph.title: Principal and interest payments.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Principal and Interest Payments,” which subheading is immediately preceded by the applicable unit-period, the following information:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-5-i
paragraph.content: The number of the payment of the first periodic principal and interest payment that may change under the terms of the legal obligation disclosed under this paragraph (i), counting from the first periodic payment due after consummation, and the amount or range of the periodic principal and interest payment for such payment, labeled “First Change/Amount”;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-5-ii
paragraph.content: The frequency of subsequent changes to the periodic principal and interest payment, labeled “Subsequent Changes”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-i-5-iii
paragraph.content: The maximum periodic principal and interest payment that may occur during the term of the transaction, and the first periodic principal and interest payment that can reach such maximum, counting from the first periodic payment due after consummation, labeled “Maximum Payment.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j
paragraph.title: Adjustable interest rate table.
paragraph.content: If the interest rate may increase after consummation, a separate table under the master heading “Closing Cost Details” required by paragraph (f) of this section and under the heading “Adjustable Interest Rate (AIR) Table” that contains the following information and satisfies the following requirements:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-1
paragraph.title: Index and margin.
paragraph.content: If the interest rate may adjust and the product type is not a “Step Rate” under paragraph (a)(10)(i)(B) of this section, the index upon which the adjustments to the interest rate are based and the margin that is added to the index to determine the interest rate, if any, labeled “Index + Margin.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-2
paragraph.title: Increases in interest rate.
paragraph.content: If the product type is a “Step Rate” and not also an “Adjustable Rate” under paragraph (a)(10)(i)(A) of this section, the maximum amount of any adjustments to the interest rate that are scheduled and pre-determined, labeled “Interest Rate Adjustments.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-3
paragraph.title: Initial interest rate.
paragraph.content: The interest rate at consummation of the loan transaction, labeled “Initial Interest Rate.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-4
paragraph.title: Minimum and maximum interest rate.
paragraph.content: The minimum and maximum interest rates for the loan, after any introductory period expires, labeled “Minimum/Maximum Interest Rate.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-5
paragraph.title: Frequency of adjustments.
paragraph.content: The following information, under the subheading “Change Frequency”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-5-i
paragraph.content: The month when the interest rate after consummation may first change, calculated from the date interest for the first scheduled periodic payment begins to accrue, labeled “First Change”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-5-ii
paragraph.content: The frequency of interest rate adjustments after the initial adjustment to the interest rate, labeled, “Subsequent Changes.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-6
paragraph.title: Limits on interest rate changes.
paragraph.content: The following information, under the subheading “Limits on Interest Rate Changes”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-6-i
paragraph.content: The maximum possible change for the first adjustment of the interest rate after consummation, labeled “First Change”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-j-6-ii
paragraph.content: The maximum possible change for subsequent adjustments of the interest rate after consummation, labeled “Subsequent Changes.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-k
paragraph.title: Contact information.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading, “Additional Information About This Loan,” the following information:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-k-1
paragraph.content: The name and Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry identification number (NMLSR ID) (labeled “NMLS ID/License ID”) for the creditor (labeled “Lender”) and the mortgage broker (labeled “Mortgage Broker”), if any. In the event the creditor or the mortgage broker has not been assigned an NMLSR ID, the license number or other unique identifier issued by the applicable jurisdiction or regulating body with which the creditor or mortgage broker is licensed and/or registered shall be disclosed, with the abbreviation for the State of the applicable jurisdiction or regulatory body stated before the word “License” in the label, if any;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-k-2
paragraph.content: The name and NMLSR ID of the individual loan officer (labeled “Loan Officer” and “NMLS ID/License ID,” respectively) of the creditor and the mortgage broker, if any, who is the primary contact for the consumer. In the event the individual loan officer has not been assigned an NMLSR ID, the license number or other unique identifier issued by the applicable jurisdiction or regulating body with which the loan officer is licensed and/or registered shall be disclosed with the abbreviation for the State of the applicable jurisdiction or regulatory body stated before the word “License” in the label, if any; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-k-3
paragraph.content: The email address and telephone number of the loan officer (labeled “Email” and “Phone,” respectively).

paragraph.label: 1026-37-l
paragraph.title: Comparisons.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading, “Additional Information About This Loan” required by paragraph (k) of this section, in a separate table under the heading “Comparisons” along with the statement “Use these measures to compare this loan with other loans”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-l-1
paragraph.title: In five years.
paragraph.content: Using the label “In 5 Years”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-l-1-i
paragraph.content: The total principal, interest, mortgage insurance, and loan costs scheduled to be paid through the end of the 60th month after the due date of the first periodic payment, expressed as a dollar amount, along with the statement “Total you will have paid in principal, interest, mortgage insurance, and loan costs”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-l-1-ii
paragraph.content: The principal scheduled to be paid through the end of the 60th month after the due date of the first periodic payment, expressed as a dollar amount, along with the statement “Principal you will have paid off.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-l-2
paragraph.title: Annual percentage rate.
paragraph.content: The “Annual Percentage Rate,” using that term and the abbreviation “APR” and expressed as a percentage, and the following statement: “Your costs over the loan term expressed as a rate. This is not your interest rate.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-l-3
paragraph.title: Total interest percentage.
paragraph.content: The total amount of interest that the consumer will pay over the life of the loan, expressed as a percentage of the amount of credit extended, using the term “Total Interest Percentage,” the abbreviation “TIP,” and the statement “The total amount of interest that you will pay over the loan term as a percentage of your loan amount.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m
paragraph.title: Other considerations.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading “Additional Information About This Loan” required by paragraph (k) of this section and under the heading “Other Considerations”:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-1
paragraph.title: Appraisal.
paragraph.content: For transactions subject to 15 U.S.C. 1639h or 1691(e), as implemented in this part or Regulation B, 12 CFR part 1002, respectively, a statement, labeled “Appraisal,” that:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-1-i
paragraph.content: The creditor may order an appraisal to determine the value of the property identified in paragraph (a)(6) of this section and may charge the consumer for that appraisal;

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-1-ii
paragraph.content: The creditor will promptly provide the consumer a copy of any appraisal, even if the transaction is not consummated; and

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-1-iii
paragraph.content: The consumer may choose to pay for an additional appraisal of the property for the consumer’s use.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-2
paragraph.title: Assumption.
paragraph.content: A statement of whether a subsequent purchaser of the property may be permitted to assume the remaining loan obligation on its original terms, labeled “Assumption.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-3
paragraph.title: Homeowner’s insurance.
paragraph.content: At the option of the creditor, a statement that homeowner’s insurance is required on the property and that the consumer may choose the insurance provider, labeled “Homeowner’s Insurance.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-4
paragraph.title: Late payment.
paragraph.content: A statement detailing any charge that may be imposed for a late payment, stated as a dollar amount or percentage charge of the late payment amount, and the number of days that a payment must be late to trigger the late payment fee, labeled “Late Payment.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-5
paragraph.title: Refinance.
paragraph.content: The following statement, labeled “Refinance”: “Refinancing this loan will depend on your future financial situation, the property value, and market conditions. You may not be able to refinance this loan.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-6
paragraph.title: Servicing.
paragraph.content: A statement of whether the creditor intends to service the loan or transfer the loan to another servicer, labeled “Servicing.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-m-7
paragraph.title: Liability after foreclosure.
paragraph.content: If the purpose of the credit transaction is to refinance an extension of credit as described in paragraph (a)(9)(ii) of this section, a brief statement that certain State law protections against liability for any deficiency after foreclosure may be lost, the potential consequences of the loss of such protections, and a statement that the consumer should consult an attorney for additional information, labeled “Liability after Foreclosure.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-n-1
paragraph.content: At the creditor’s option, under the master heading required by paragraph (k) of this section and under the heading “Confirm Receipt,” a line for the signatures of the consumers in the transaction. If the creditor includes a line for the consumer’s signature, the creditor must disclose the following above the signature line: “By signing, you are only confirming that you have received this form. You do not have to accept this loan because you have signed or received this form.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-n-2
paragraph.content: If the creditor does not include a line for the consumer’s signature, the creditor must disclose the following statement under the heading “Other Considerations” required by paragraph (m) of this section, labeled “Loan Acceptance”: “You do not have to accept this loan because you have received this form or signed a loan application.”

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-1-i
paragraph.content: The creditor shall make the disclosures required by this section clearly and conspicuously in writing, in a form that the consumer may keep. The disclosures also shall be grouped together and segregated from everything else.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-1-ii
paragraph.content: Except as provided in paragraph (o)(5) of this section, the disclosures shall contain only the information required by paragraphs (a) through (n) of this section and shall be made in the same order, and positioned relative to the master headings, headings, subheadings, labels, and similar designations in the same manner, as shown in form H–24, set forth in appendix H to this part.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-2
paragraph.title: Headings and labels.
paragraph.content: If a master heading, heading, subheading, label, or similar designation contains the word “estimated” or a capital letter designation in form H–24, set forth in appendix H to this part, that heading, label, or similar designation shall contain the word “estimated” and the applicable capital letter designation.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-3
paragraph.title: Form.
paragraph.content: Except as provided in paragraph (o)(5) of this section:

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-3-i
paragraph.content: For a transaction subject to § 1026.19(e) that is a federally related mortgage loan, as defined in Regulation X, 12 CFR 1024.2, the disclosures must be made using form H–24, set forth in appendix H to this part.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-3-ii
paragraph.content: For any other transaction subject to this section, the disclosures must be made with headings, content, and format substantially similar to form H– 24, set forth in appendix H to this part.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-3-iii
paragraph.content: The disclosures required by this section may be provided to the consumer in electronic form, subject to compliance with the consumer consent and other applicable provisions of the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act (15 U.S.C. 7001 et seq.).

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-4-i
paragraph.content: Nearest dollar.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-4-i-A
paragraph.content: The dollar amounts required to be disclosed by paragraphs (b)(6) and (7), (c)(1)(iii), (c)(2)(ii) and (iii), (c)(4)(ii), (f), (g), (h), (i), and (l) of this section shall be rounded to the nearest whole dollar, except that the per diem amount required to be disclosed by paragraph (g)(2)(iii) of this section and the monthly amounts required to be disclosed by paragraphs (g)(3)(i) through (iv) of this section shall not be rounded.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-4-i-B
paragraph.content: The dollar amount required to be disclosed by paragraph (b)(1) of this section shall not be rounded, and if the amount is a whole number then the amount disclosed shall be truncated at the decimal point.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-4-i-C
paragraph.content: The dollar amounts required to be disclosed by paragraph (c)(2)(iv) of this section shall be rounded to the nearest whole dollar, if any of the component amounts are required by paragraph (o)(4)(i)(A) of this section to be rounded to the nearest whole dollar.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-4-ii
paragraph.title: Percentages.
paragraph.content: The percentage amounts required to be disclosed under paragraphs (b)(2) and (6), (f)(1)(i), (g)(2)(iii), (j), and (l)(3) of this section shall not be rounded and shall be disclosed up to two or three decimal places. The percentage amount required to be disclosed under paragraph (l)(2) of this section shall be disclosed up to three decimal places. If the amount is a whole number then the amount disclosed shall be truncated at the decimal point.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-5-i
paragraph.title: Unit-period.
paragraph.content: Wherever the form or this section uses “monthly” to describe the frequency of any payments or uses “month” to describe the applicable unit-period, the creditor shall substitute the appropriate term to reflect the fact that the transaction’s terms provide for other than monthly periodic payments, such as bi-weekly or quarterly payments.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-5-ii
paragraph.title: Translation.
paragraph.content: The form may be translated into languages other than English, and creditors may modify form H–24 of appendix H to this part to the extent that translation prevents the headings, labels, designations, and required disclosure items under this section from fitting in the space provided on form H–24.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-5-iii
paragraph.title: Logo or slogan.
paragraph.content: The creditor providing the form may use a logo for, and include a slogan with, the information required by paragraph (a)(3) of this section in any font size or type, provided that such logo or slogan does not cause the information required by paragraph (a)(3) of this section to exceed the space provided for that information, as illustrated in form H–24 of appendix H to this part. If the creditor does not use a logo for the information required by paragraph (a)(3) of this section, the information shall be disclosed in a similar format as form H–24.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-5-iv
paragraph.title: Business card.
paragraph.content: The creditor may physically attach a business card over the information required to be disclosed by paragraph (a)(3) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-37-o-5-v
paragraph.title: Administrative information.
paragraph.content: The creditor may insert at the bottom of each page under the disclosures required by this section as illustrated by form H–24 of appendix H to this part, any administrative information, text, or codes that assist in identification of the form or the information disclosed on the form, provided that the space provided on form H–24 of appendix H to this part for any of the information required by this section is not altered.

section.subject: § 1026.38 Content of disclosures for certain mortgage transactions (Closing Disclosure).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-p1
paragraph.content: For each transaction subject to § 1026.19(f), the creditor shall disclose the information in this section:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-1
paragraph.title: Form title.
paragraph.content: The title of the form, “Closing Disclosure,” using that term.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-2
paragraph.title: Form purpose.
paragraph.content: The following statement: “This form is a statement of final loan terms and closing costs. Compare this document with your Loan Estimate.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3
paragraph.title: Closing information.
paragraph.content: Under the heading “Closing Information”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-i
paragraph.title: Date issued.
paragraph.content: The date the disclosures required by this section are delivered to the consumer, labeled “Date Issued.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-ii
paragraph.title: Closing date.
paragraph.content: The date of consummation, labeled “Closing Date.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-iii
paragraph.title: Disbursement date.
paragraph.content: The date the amounts disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (j)(3)(iii) and (k)(3)(iii) of this section are expected to be paid in a purchase transaction under § 1026.37(a)(9)(i) to the consumer and seller, respectively, as applicable, or the date the amounts disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (j)(2)(iii) or (t)(5)(vii)(B) of this section are expected to be paid to the consumer or a third party in a transaction that is not a purchase transaction under § 1026.37(a)(9)(i), labeled “Disbursement Date.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-iv
paragraph.title: Settlement agent.
paragraph.content: The name of the settlement agent conducting the closing, labeled “Settlement Agent.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-v
paragraph.title: File number.
paragraph.content: The number assigned to the transaction by the settlement agent for identification purposes, labeled “File #.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-vi
paragraph.title: Property.
paragraph.content: The address or location of the property required to be disclosed under § 1026.37(a)(6), labeled “Property.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-vii-A
paragraph.content: In credit transactions where there is a seller, the contract sale price of the property identified in paragraph (a)(3)(vi) of this section, labeled “Sale Price.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-3-vii-B
paragraph.content: In credit transactions where there is no seller, the appraised value of the property identified in paragraph (a)(3)(vi) of this section, labeled “Appraised Prop. Value.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-4
paragraph.title: Transaction information.
paragraph.content: Under the heading “Transaction Information”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-4-i
paragraph.title: Borrower.
paragraph.content: The consumer’s name and mailing address, labeled “Borrower.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-4-ii
paragraph.title: Seller.
paragraph.content: Where applicable, the seller’s name and mailing address, labeled “Seller.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-4-iii
paragraph.title: Lender.
paragraph.content: The name of the creditor making the disclosure, labeled “Lender.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5
paragraph.title: Loan information.
paragraph.content: Under the heading “Loan Information”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5-i
paragraph.title: Loan term.
paragraph.content: The information required to be disclosed under § 1026.37(a)(8), labeled “Loan Term.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5-ii
paragraph.title: Purpose.
paragraph.content: The information required to be disclosed under § 1026.37(a)(9), labeled “Purpose.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5-iii
paragraph.title: Product.
paragraph.content: The information required to be disclosed under § 1026.37(a)(10), labeled “Product.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5-iv
paragraph.title: Loan type.
paragraph.content: The information required to be disclosed under § 1026.37(a)(11), labeled “Loan Type.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5-v
paragraph.title: Loan identification number.
paragraph.content: The information required to be disclosed under § 1026.37(a)(12), labeled “Loan ID #.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-a-5-vi
paragraph.title: Mortgage insurance case number.
paragraph.content: The case number for any mortgage insurance policy, if required by the creditor, labeled “MIC #.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-b
paragraph.title: Loan terms.
paragraph.content: A separate table under the heading “Loan Terms” that includes the information required by § 1026.37(b).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-c
paragraph.title: Projected payments.
paragraph.content: A separate table, under the heading “Projected Payments,” that includes and satisfies the following information and requirements:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-c-1
paragraph.title: Projected payments or range of payments.
paragraph.content: The information required to be disclosed pursuant to § 1026.37(c)(1) through (4), other than § 1026.37(c)(4)(vi). In disclosing estimated escrow payments as described in § 1026.37(c)(2)(iii) and (c)(4)(ii), the amount disclosed on the Closing Disclosure:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-c-1-i
paragraph.content: For transactions subject to RESPA, is determined under the escrow account analysis described in Regulation X, 12 CFR 1024.17;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-c-1-ii
paragraph.content: For transactions not subject to RESPA, may be determined under the escrow account analysis described in Regulation X, 12 CFR 1024.17 or in the manner set forth in § 1026.37(c)(5).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-c-2
paragraph.title: Estimated taxes, insurance, and assessments.
paragraph.content: A reference to the disclosure required by paragraph (l)(7) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1
paragraph.title: Costs at closing table.
paragraph.content: In a separate table, under the heading “Costs at Closing”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-i
paragraph.content: Labeled “Closing Costs,” the sum of the dollar amounts disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f)(4), (g)(5), and (h)(3) of this section, together with:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-i-A
paragraph.content: A statement that the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (d)(1)(i) of this section includes the amounts disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f)(4), (g)(5), and (h)(3) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-i-B
paragraph.content: The dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (f)(4) of this section, labeled “Loan Costs”;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-i-C
paragraph.content: The dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (g)(5) of this section, labeled “Other Costs”;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-i-D
paragraph.content: The dollar amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (h)(3) of this section, labeled “Lender Credits”; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-i-E
paragraph.content: A statement referring the consumer to the tables disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f) and (g) of this section for details.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-ii
paragraph.content: Labeled “Cash to Close,” the sum of the dollar amounts calculated in accordance with paragraph (i)(9)(ii) of this section, together with:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-ii-A
paragraph.content: A statement that the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (d)(1)(ii) of this section includes the amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (d)(1)(i) of this section; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-1-ii-B
paragraph.content: A statement referring the consumer to the table required pursuant to paragraph (i) of this section for details.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-2
paragraph.title: Alternative table for transactions without a seller.
paragraph.content: For transactions that do not involve a seller and where the creditor disclosed the optional alternative table pursuant to § 1026.37(d)(2), the creditor shall disclose, with the label “Cash to Close,” instead of the sum of the dollar amounts described in paragraph (d)(1)(ii) of this section:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-2-i
paragraph.content: The amount calculated in accordance with paragraph (e)(5)(ii) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-2-ii
paragraph.content: A statement of whether the disclosed amount is due from or to the consumer; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-d-2-iii
paragraph.content: A statement referring the consumer to the table required pursuant to paragraph (e) of this section for details.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e
paragraph.title: Alternative calculating cash to close table for transactions without a seller.
paragraph.content: For transactions that do not involve a seller and where the creditor disclosed the optional alternative table pursuant to § 1026.37(h)(2), the creditor shall disclose, instead of the table described in paragraph (i) of this section, in a separate table, under the heading “Calculating Cash to Close,” together with the statement “Use this table to see what has changed from your Loan Estimate”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-1
paragraph.title: Loan amount.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Loan Amount:”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-1-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the loan amount disclosed on the Loan Estimate under § 1026.37(b)(1);

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-1-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the loan amount disclosed under paragraph (b) of this section;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-1-iii
paragraph.content: Disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under paragraph (e)(1)(i) and (ii) of this section, under the subheading “Did this change?”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-1-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(1)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(1)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact along with a statement of whether this amount increased or decreased; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-1-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(1)(i) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(1)(ii) of this section a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2
paragraph.title: Total closing costs.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Total Closing Costs”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the amount disclosed on the Loan Estimate under § 1026.37(h)(2)(ii);

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the amount disclosed under paragraph (h)(1) of this section, disclosed as a negative number; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-iii
paragraph.content: Disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (e)(2)(i) and (ii) of this section, under the subheading “Did this change?”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(2)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(2)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-iii-A-1
paragraph.content: A statement of that fact;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-iii-A-2
paragraph.content: If the difference in the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (e)(2)(i) and (e)(2)(ii) is attributable to differences in itemized charges that are included in either or both subtotals, a statement that the consumer should see the total loan costs and total other costs subtotals disclosed under paragraphs (f)(4) and (g)(5) of this section (together with references to such disclosures), as applicable; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-iii-A-3
paragraph.content: If the increase exceeds the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3), a statement that such increase exceeds the legal limits by the dollar amount of the excess and if any refund is provided pursuant to § 1026.19(f)(2)(v), a statement directing the consumer to the disclosure required under paragraph (h)(3) of this section. Such dollar amount shall equal the sum total of all excesses of the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3), taking into account the different methods of calculating excesses of the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3)(i) and (ii).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-2-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(2)(i) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(2)(ii) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-3
paragraph.title: Closing costs paid before closing.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Closing Costs Paid Before Closing:”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-3-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the amount of $0;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-3-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” any amount designated as borrower–paid before closing under paragraph (h)(2) of this section, disclosed as a positive number; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-3-iii
paragraph.content: Disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (e)(3)(i) and (ii) of this section, under the subheading “Did this change?”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-3-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(3)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(3)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact along with a statement that the consumer included the closing costs in the loan amount, which increased the loan amount; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-3-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(3)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(3)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-4
paragraph.title: Payoffs and payments.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Total Payoffs and Payments,”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-4-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the total payoffs and payments disclosed on the Loan Estimate under § 1026.37(h)(2)(iii);

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-4-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the total amount of payoffs and payments made to third parties not otherwise disclosed pursuant to paragraph (t)(5)(vii)(B) of this section, to the extent known, disclosed as a negative number;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-4-iii
paragraph.content: Disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (e)(4)(i) and (ii), under the subheading “Did this change?”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-4-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(4)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(4)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact along with a reference to the table disclosed under paragraph (t)(5)(vii)(B) of this section; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-4-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(4)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (e)(4)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-5
paragraph.title: Cash to or from consumer.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Cash to Close:”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-5-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the estimated cash to close on the Loan Estimate together with the statement of whether the estimated amount is due from or to the consumer as disclosed under § 1026.37(h)(2)(iv);

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-5-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the amount due from or to the consumer, calculated by the sum of the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (e)(1)(ii), (e)(2)(ii), (e)(3)(ii), and (e)(4)(ii) of this section, disclosed as a positive number, together with a statement of whether the disclosed amount is due from or to the consumer.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-e-6
paragraph.title: Closing costs financed.
paragraph.content: Labeled “Closing Costs Financed (Paid from your Loan Amount),” the sum of the amounts disclosed under paragraphs (e)(1)(ii) and (e)(4)(ii) of this section, but only to the extent that the sum is greater than zero and less than or equal to the sum disclosed under paragraph (h)(1) of this section minus the sum disclosed under paragraph (h)(2) of this section designated borrower-paid before closing.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-f
paragraph.title: Closing cost details; loan costs.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading “Closing Cost Details” with columns stating whether the charge was borrower-paid at or before closing, seller-paid at or before closing, or paid by others, all loan costs associated with the transaction, listed in a table under the heading “Loan Costs.” The table shall contain the items and amounts listed under four subheadings, described in paragraphs (f)(1) through (5) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-f-1
paragraph.title: Origination charges.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Origination Charges,” and in the applicable columns as described in paragraph (f) of this section, an itemization of each amount paid for charges described in § 1026.37(f)(1), the amount of compensation paid by the creditor to a third-party loan originator along with the name of the loan originator ultimately receiving the payment, and the total of all such itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-f-2
paragraph.title: Services borrower did not shop for.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Services Borrower Did Not Shop For” and in the applicable columns as described in paragraph (f) of this section, an itemization of the services and corresponding costs for each of the settlement services required by the creditor for which the consumer did not shop in accordance with §1026.19(e)(1)(vi)(A) and that are provided by persons other than the creditor or mortgage broker, the name of the person ultimately receiving the payment for each such amount, and the total of all such itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing. Items that were disclosed pursuant to § 1026.37(f)(3) must be disclosed under this paragraph (f)(2) if the consumer was provided a written list of settlement service providers under § 1026.19(e)(1)(vi)(C) and the consumer selected a settlement service provider contained on that written list.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-f-3
paragraph.title: Services borrower did shop for.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Services Borrower Did Shop For” and in the applicable column as described in paragraph (f) of this section, an itemization of the services and corresponding costs for each of the settlement services required by the creditor for which the consumer shopped in accordance with §1026.19(e)(1)(vi)(A) and that are provided by persons other than the creditor or mortgage broker, the name of the person ultimately receiving the payment for each such amount, and the total of all such itemized costs that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing. Items that were disclosed pursuant to § 1026.37(f)(3) must be disclosed under this paragraph (f)(3) if the consumer was provided a written list of settlement service providers under § 1026.19(e)(1)(vi)(C) and the consumer did not select a settlement service provider contained on that written list.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-f-4
paragraph.title: Total loan costs.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Total Loan Costs (Borrower-Paid),” the sum of the amounts disclosed as borrower-paid pursuant to paragraph (f)(5) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-f-5
paragraph.title: Subtotal of loan costs.
paragraph.content: The sum of loan costs, calculated by totaling the amounts described in paragraphs (f)(1) through (3) of this section for costs designated borrower-paid at or before closing, labeled “Loan Costs Subtotals.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g
paragraph.title: Closing cost details; other costs.
paragraph.content: Under the master heading “Closing Cost Details” disclosed pursuant to paragraph (f) of this section, with columns stating whether the charge was borrower-paid at or before closing, seller-paid at or before closing, or paid by others, all costs in connection with the transaction, other than those disclosed under paragraph (f) of this section, listed in a table with a heading disclosed as “Other Costs.” The table shall contain the items and amounts listed under five subheadings, described in paragraphs (g)(1) through (6) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-1
paragraph.title: Taxes and other government fees.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Taxes and Other Government Fees,” and in the applicable column as described in paragraph (g) of this section, an itemization of each amount that is expected to be paid to State and local governments for taxes and government fees and the total of all such itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing, as follows:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-1-i
paragraph.content: Recording fees and the amounts paid in the applicable columns; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-1-ii
paragraph.content: An itemization of transfer taxes, with the name of the government entity assessing the transfer tax.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-2
paragraph.title: Prepaids.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Prepaids” and in the applicable column as described in paragraph (g) of this section, an itemization of each amount for charges described in § 1026.37(g)(2), the name of the person ultimately receiving the payment or government entity assessing the property tax, provided that the person ultimately receiving the payment need not be disclosed for the disclosure required by § 1026.37(g)(2)(iii) when disclosed pursuant to this paragraph, and the total of all such itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-3
paragraph.title: Initial escrow payment at closing.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Initial escrow payment at closing” and in the applicable column as described in paragraph (g) of this section, an itemization of each amount for charges described in § 1026.37(g)(3), the applicable aggregate adjustment pursuant to 12 CFR 1024.17(d)(2) along with the label “aggregate adjustment,” and the total of all such itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-4
paragraph.title: Other.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Other” and in the applicable column as described in paragraph (g) of this section, an itemization of each amount for charges in connection with the transaction that are in addition to the charges disclosed under paragraphs (f) and (g)(1) through (3) for services that are required or obtained in the real estate closing by the consumer, the seller, or other party, the name of the person ultimately receiving the payment, and the total of all such itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-4-i
paragraph.content: For any cost that is a component of title insurance services, the introductory description “Title —” shall appear at the beginning of the label for that actual cost.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-4-ii
paragraph.content: The parenthetical description “(optional)” shall appear at the end of the label for costs designated borrower-paid at or before closing for any premiums paid for separate insurance, warranty, guarantee, or event-coverage products.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-5
paragraph.title: Total other costs.
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Total Other Costs (Borrower-Paid),” the sum of the amounts disclosed as borrower-paid pursuant to paragraph (g)(6) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-g-6
paragraph.title: Subtotal of costs.
paragraph.content: The sum of other costs, calculated by totaling the costs disclosed in paragraphs (g)(1) through (4) of this section designated borrower-paid at or before closing, labeled “Other Costs Subtotals.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-h-1
paragraph.content: The sum of the costs disclosed as borrower-paid pursuant to paragraph (h)(2) of this section and the amount disclosed in paragraph (h)(3) of this section, under the subheading “Total Closing Costs (Borrower-Paid).”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-h-2
paragraph.content: The sum of the amounts disclosed in paragraphs (f)(5) and (g)(6) of this section, designated borrower-paid at or before closing, and the sum of the costs designated seller-paid at or before closing or paid by others disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f) and (g) of this section, labeled “Closing Costs Subtotals.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-h-3
paragraph.content: The amount described in § 1026.37(g)(6)(ii) as a negative number, labeled “Lender Credits” and designated borrower-paid at closing, and if a refund is provided pursuant to § 1026.19(f)(2)(v), a statement that this amount includes a credit for an amount that exceeds the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3), and the amount of such credit under § 1026.19(f)(2)(v).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-h-4
paragraph.content: The services and costs disclosed pursuant to paragraphs (f) and (g) of this section on the Closing Disclosure shall be labeled using terminology that describes the item disclosed, in a manner that is consistent with the descriptions or prescribed labels, as applicable, used for such items on the Loan Estimate pursuant to § 1026.37. The creditor must also list the items on the Closing Disclosure in the same sequential order as on the Loan Estimate pursuant to § 1026.37.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i
paragraph.title: Calculating cash to close.
paragraph.content: In a separate table, under the heading “Calculating Cash to Close,” together with the statement “Use this table to see what has changed from your Loan Estimate”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the “Total Closing Costs” disclosed on the Loan Estimate under § 1026.37(h)(1)(i), labeled using that term.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the amount disclosed under paragraph (h)(1) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-iii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Did this change?,” disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (i)(1):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(1)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(1)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-i-A-1
paragraph.content: A statement of that fact;

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-iii-A-2
paragraph.content: If the difference in the “Total Closing Costs” is attributable to differences in itemized charges that are included in either or both subtotals, a statement that the consumer should see the total loan costs and total other costs subtotals disclosed under paragraphs (f)(4) and (g)(5) of this section (together with references to such disclosures), as applicable; and

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-iii-A-3
paragraph.content: If the increase exceeds the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3), a statement that such increase exceeds the legal limits by the dollar amount of the excess, and if any refund is provided pursuant to § 1026.19(f)(2)(v), a statement directing the consumer to the disclosure required under paragraph (h)(3) of this section. Such dollar amount shall equal the sum total of all excesses of the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3), taking into account the different methods of calculating excesses of the limitations on increases in closing costs under § 1026.19(e)(3)(i) and (ii).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-1-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(1)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(1)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-2-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the dollar amount “$0,” labeled “Closing Costs Paid Before Closing.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-2-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the amount of “Total Closing Costs” disclosed under paragraph (h)(2) of this section and designated as borrower-paid before closing, stated as a negative number.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-2-iii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Did this change?,” disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (i)(2):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-2-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(2)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(2)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact, along with a statement that the consumer paid such amounts prior to consummation of the transaction; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-2-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(2)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(2)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-3-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the amount disclosed under § 1026.37(h)(1)(ii), labeled “Closing Costs Financed (Paid from your Loan Amount).”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-3-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the actual amount of the closing costs that are to be paid out of loan proceeds, if any, stated as a negative number.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-3-iii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Did this change?,” disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (i)(3):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-3-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(3)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(3)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact, along with a statement that the consumer included the closing costs in the loan amount, which increased the loan amount; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-3-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(3)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(3)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the amount disclosed under § 1026.37(h)(1)(iii), labeled “Down Payment/Funds from Borrower.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final”:

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-ii-A
paragraph.content: In a transaction that is a purchase as defined in § 1026.37(a)(9)(i), the amount of the difference between the purchase price of the property and the principal amount of the credit extended, stated as a positive number, labeled “Down Payment/Funds from Borrower”; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-ii-B
paragraph.content: In a transaction other than the type described in paragraph (i)(4)(ii)(A) of this section, the “Funds from Borrower” as determined in accordance with paragraph (i)(6)(iv) of this section, labeled “Down Payment/Funds from Borrower.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-iii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Did this change?,” disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (i)(4):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(4)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(4)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact, along with a statement that the consumer increased or decreased this payment and that the consumer should see the details disclosed under paragraph (j)(1) or (j)(2) of this section, as applicable; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-4-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(4)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(4)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-5-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the amount disclosed under § 1026.37(h)(1)(iv), labeled “Deposit.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-5-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the amount disclosed under paragraph (j)(2)(ii) of this section, stated as a negative number.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-5-iii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Did this change?,” disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (i)(5):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-5-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(5)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(5)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact, along with a statement that the consumer increased or decreased this payment, as applicable, and that the consumer should see the details disclosed under paragraph (j)(2)(ii) of this section; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-5-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(5)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(5)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-i
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Loan Estimate,” the amount disclosed under § 1026.37(h)(1)(v), labeled “Funds for Borrower.”

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-ii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Final,” the “Funds for Borrower,” labeled using that term, as determined in accordance with paragraph (i)(6)(iv) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-iii
paragraph.content: Under the subheading “Did this change?,” disclosed more prominently than the other disclosures under this paragraph (i)(6):

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-iii-A
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(6)(ii) of this section is different than the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(6)(i) of this section (unless the difference is due to rounding), a statement of that fact, along with a statement that the consumer’s available funds from the loan amount have increased or decreased, as applicable; or

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-iii-B
paragraph.content: If the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(6)(ii) of this section is equal to the amount disclosed under paragraph (i)(6)(i) of this section, a statement of that fact.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-iv
paragraph.content: The “Funds from Borrower” to be disclosed under paragraph (i)(4)(ii)(B) of this section and “Funds for Borrower” to be disclosed under paragraph (i)(6)(ii) of this section are determined by subtracting the principal amount of the credit extended (excluding any amount disclosed pursuant to paragraph (i)(3)(ii) of this section) from the total amount of all existing debt being satisfied in the real estate closing and disclosed under paragraph (j)(1)(v) of this section (except to the extent the satisfaction of such existing debt is disclosed under paragraph (g) of this section).

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-iv-A
paragraph.content: If the calculation under this paragraph (i)(6)(iv) yields an amount that is a positive number, such amount shall be disclosed under paragraph (i)(4)(ii)(B) of this section, and $0 shall be disclosed under paragraph (i)(6)(ii) of this section.

paragraph.label: 1026-38-i-6-iv-B
